TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TiffBitmapEncoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder
Public NotInheritable Class TiffBitmapEncoder Inherits BitmapEncoder

summary.span: Define un codificador que se usa para codificar imágenes de formato Tagged Image File Format (TIFF).

span.span: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Tagged Image File Format (TIFF) format images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] formato de mapa de bits es compatible con las miniaturas de nivel de marco, varios marcos y metadatos de nivel de marco.The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] bitmap format supports frame level thumbnails, multiple frames, and frame level metadata. No admite metadatos globales, miniaturas globales o vista previa global.It does not support global preview, global thumbnails, or global metadata. Codificación no funciona en confianza parcial.Encoding does not work in partial trust. Vea [seguridad de confianza parcial de WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) para obtener información sobre la confianza parcial.See [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) for information on partial trust.

summary.span: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica el tipo de compresión que usa esta imagen [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)].

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the type of compression that is used by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] image.
